mapper.sql: order_id, repay_date, payable_amount, actual_repay_amount, is_overdue, overdue_amount, check_date, status, nper
mapper.insert:
insert into loan_repay_plan
order_id,
repay_date,
payable_amount,
actual_repay_amount,
is_overdue,
overdue_amount,
check_date,
status,
nper,
#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{repayDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{payableAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{actualRepayAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{isOverdue,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{overdueAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{nper,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update loan_repay_plan
payable_amount = #{payableAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
actual_repay_amount = #{actualRepayAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
is_overdue = #{isOverdue,jdbcType=TINYINT},
overdue_amount = #{overdueAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
check_date = #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
nper = #{nper,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and repay_date = #{repayDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
